properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 25 at 11:52AM EST until January 25 at 7:15PM EST by NWS Mount Holly NJ
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a flood warning for
the following rivers in Pennsylvania...

Chester Creek Near Chester affecting Delaware County

The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Chester Creek at Chester.
* until this evening...Or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 11:46 AM Saturday the stage was 7.8 feet.
* Flood stage is 8.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...Rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue to rise to
near 8.2 feet by this afternoon.the river will fall below flood stage by this
afternoon.
* Impact...At 7.0 feet...The creek floods adjacent open land.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.1 feet on Sep 15
2003.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...Do not attempt to drive through flooded areas. The water may be
deeper than you think.
